Package com.mygame.handlers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Used to store animation that contain set of frames, information about delay between them, which one is current frame, times played, is animation looped or if it has ended
    Constants
    Consists of game constants such as pixels per meter (for unit conversion between physics engine units which are meter/kilogram/second and screen units, which are pixels), collision masks or item names
    Content
    Consists of a hash map for each data type that need to be stored for further use
    GameStateManager
    Manager of game states that is based on a stack of game states, only state that is rendered and updated is the state on top of the stack
    MyContactListener
    Handling of collision response
    MyInput
    Used to store which keys are pressed in current frame and which were pressed in previous
    MyInputProcessor
    Listener that sets up MyInput's arrays of keys pressed accordingly to what keys are pressed
    Timer
    Simple time counter
